mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Colton, J. H. (Joseph Hutchins), 1800-1893
J.H. Colton & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by J.H. Colton & Co. No. 172 William Street
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map does not include Wise County, which was formed in 1856.
Two insets: Richmond Henrico County, Manchester and Spring Hill Chesterfield Co. -- Norfolk, Portsmouth and Gosport. (separate scales)
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1855 by J.H. Colton & Co. in the Clerks Office of the District Court for the Southern District of New York."
Explanations: Rail Roads, Common, Canals, State Capital, County Towns, Vill. P.O. & Depots
Printed on lightweight paper, without plate number.
Was probably folded into covers which are no longer present.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Maps--19th century.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York (City), New York (State), United States
